segments.text: Peeking into this kitchen, everything seems ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands by the sink, attentively polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window bathes the room in a soft glow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the faucet is on, and the sink is brimming over!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, forming a puddle on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, one foot submerged in the growing pool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning my gaze left, the cabinet is open to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is on the stool, which looks unsteady as he reaches in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, balancing precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby extends her hand, joining in the cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so sneaky and risky, with the wet floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden through the window contrasts sharply with this indoor frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never expected such hidden perils in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
